content: this crochet halter top pattern includes 8 page written pattern and photo tutorial as well as a link to the video tutorial to make it as smooth as possible this pattern includes us women s sizes xs-xxl any questions you may come across in making this pattern will be answered inside but if not feel free to message me materials #4 medium weight yarn i used red heart amore #4 medium weight yarn crochet hook size 4 mm scissors yarn needle notes this crochet halter top pattern made as us women s sizes xs s m l xl xxl this crochet halter top pattern is made in 2 separate pieces and then sewn together this crochet halter top pattern is in multiples of 3 chain in this picture i have demonstrated with size small yarn needed 310 330 370 390 430 450 yards gauge blocked 14 double_crochet x 8 row = 4 measurements after blocked xs = 13 14 width across back x 14 50 length s = 14 85 width across back x 14 50 length m = 16 57 width across back x 15 50 length l = 18 28 width across back x 15 50 length xl = 20 width across back x 16 50 length xxl = 21 71 width across back x 16 50 length thanks for stopping by happy crocheting
